Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-36926 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.35.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-36926 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.35.1-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
